review.title: “Great company to work for.”
review.pros: Pros – The boss is very understanding and willing to work with you when unexpected things come up. He knows the industry very well and can move the company forward to the next level.
review.cons: Cons – As with any job in this industry, there are long hours. The weather conditions can always be extreme either way.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep doing what you are doing.
